director.name: 尼古拉·默尔吉内亚努 Nicolae Mărgineanu

this_title: Fals tratat de mântuire a sufletului
introduction: Tom is an inspector at CNSAS. Almost all the teachings he teaches to his youngest "apprentice" is one of revenge and threats, hoping to make this young man a "security hunter". But Radu, who did not live in communism, casts doubt on him whenever he has the opportunity. It is time for the Radu-Toma team to get in touch with a file that seems to bring not only the collaboration with the Securitate of a church girl - Father Justin, but even a criminal act. In 1988, a young student passed to monasticism committed a suicide act. Thomas is convinced that the old monk is involved in the suicide of the novice. The two of them went up to the bed of Father Justin in a cave on a mountain peak. At the end of this confrontation of human convictions and energies, none of those involved will be the same as before.
foreign_title: Fals tratat de mântuire a sufletului
